meta.name: Inside the Four Seasons Park Lane
meta.description: You are cordially invited to check in for a five star stay at Four Seasons Hotel London at Park Lane! The iconic yet discreet hotel in the heart of London's Mayfair throws open its doors to cameras for the very first time as we learn the secrets of five-star service.

videos.title: Inside The Four Seasons at Christmas 2025
videos.overview: Following the staff of the five-star hotel during the festive period. 'Queen of Christmas d√©cor' Ruth makes a pine-scented pilgrimage to Scotland to hand-pick a tree bigger and better than any other in London. Head chef Benjamin follows the Michelin star to select the finest cheeses from London's most exclusive fromagerie, and there's a flurry in the pastry kitchen as the team gets creative, crafting a Christmas afternoon tea.
